author: Staff Reporter
text:
Five persons were arrested here on Tuesday in connection with the murder of a painter at Masilamanipuram.

The arrested were P. Ravichandran (30) and J. Suresh Kumar (25) of Bharathipuram, S. Kovil Kuzhandai Raj (25) of Anumantha Nagar, P. Prasanth (21) and P. John Surya of West Mariyanathapram.

The arrested were produced before the judicial magistrate court and remanded in 15 days judicial custody.

Painter Ganesan (40) of Dindigul Round Road was attacked by a gang following a land dispute.

He succumbed to his injuries at Dindigul Government hospital yesterday.

Investigations

The Taluk police are investigating the case.
title: Five persons arrested in murder case
